param.name: destination
param.comment: can be a space or an object in a zone. Providing Sector and Cluster will attempt to find the nearest zone

param.name: position
param.comment: position is treated as an offset to destination. Default: safe position on [0,0,0] of destination

param.name: rotation
param.comment: rotation the ship should have - overrides lookat

param.name: lookat
param.comment: position the ship should point to - overridden by rotation

param.name: nojump
param.comment: set true to prevent Big ships from using their jumpdrive (only use for insector movement - for review when we have capship in-sector boosters)

param.name: skipcharge
param.comment: skip the jump drive charge time (only to be used in special cases e.g. plot missions)

param.name: ignorefuel
param.comment: ignore jump fuel requirements (only to be used in special cases e.g. plot missions)

param.name: autorefuel
param.comment: automatically take steps to re-fuel if necessary

param.name: disablecollisionavoidance
param.comment: HACK - disable collisionavoidance for this ship

param.name: endintargetzone
param.comment: complete this script if we are in the correct zone, no matter where

do_if.value: not this.$refueling? and this.ship.cargo.{ware.fuelcells}.free and this.ship.cargo.{ware.fuelcells}.count lt [this.ship.cargo.{ware.fuelcells}.max * 0.2f,this.ship.jumpcostto.{$destination}].min

param.name: destination
param.comment: Object to move relative to - will default to relative to Zone if not set

param.name: position
param.comment: position is treated as an offset to destination. Default: safe position on [0,0,0] of destination

param.name: rotation
param.comment: rotation the ship should have - overridden by lookat

param.name: lookat
param.comment: position the ship should point to - overrides rotation

param.name: endintargetspace
param.comment: complete this script if we have the correct Space context, no matter where (may be Cluster, Sector or Zone, will resolve to Zone if an Object is the destination)
